props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: errors
props.description:
An object where the keys correspond to the `name` attribute of the form fields,
and the values correspond to the error(s) related to that field.

props.name: onClearErrors
props.description: Event handler called when the `errors` object is cleared.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
